backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, community posts with likes/comments, chat messages, test results tracking, daily tasks, and blob storage with access control via mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including profile auto-sync, removal of custom usernames, Study Room navigation with Google Meet integration, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including routing, Pomodoro timer, study metrics, community features, NCERT viewer, test series, and UI utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH dark navy/black color palette optimized for dark mode study interface with custom CSS variables for theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with pre-hydration theme bootstrap script that applies dark mode class before React mounts to prevent flash of unstyled content.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, timer, community, NCERT, PDF viewer, test series, and daily target pages wrapped in QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper component managing theme application, theme toggle visibility, welcome overlay display logic, and authentication profile bootstrapping for all routes.
frontend/src/components/community/ChatPa: Group chat component with scrollable message list, message input form, and admin delete functionality for messages.
frontend/src/components/community/Commen: Displays comments for a post with add/delete functionality, showing user avatars and timestamps with admin moderation controls.
frontend/src/components/community/ErrorB: Reusable error alert banner with an optional dismiss button for displaying error messages.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCa: Displays a social media post with image, caption, like button, comments section, and admin controls for deletion and user blocking.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCo: Form for creating new posts with image upload (max 5MB), caption input (max 500 chars), and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/dailyTarget/Dail: Individual task item with checkbox for completion, inline editing capability, and delete button with loading states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Provides UI controls for uploading custom dashboard backgrounds or resetting to default, with authentication checks, file validation (type/size), and error handling using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/FocusBabuLogo.ts: Reusable logo component with navbar and centered variants, click navigation to homepage, and hover effects with focus accessibility.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component using Internet Identity hook to handle sign-in/sign-out with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/ncert/ChapterLis: Displays a list of NCERT chapters with view and download buttons for each PDF, validating URLs and handling navigation to the PDF viewer or triggering downloads.
frontend/src/components/ncert/ClassSecti: Renders an expandable/collapsible card for a class (e.g., Class 11/12) that displays subject cards (Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Mathematics) when expanded.
frontend/src/components/ncert/SubjectCar: Displays an expandable card for a subject showing its chapters, supporting both single-part and multi-part subjects with nested chapter lists.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Co: Provides a color picker UI with preset colors and custom hex input for changing the Pomodoro timer color. Syncs custom color input with parent state changes.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Du: Renders controls for adjusting focus and break durations with increment/decrement buttons and direct number input, clamped between 1-120 minutes for focus and 1-60 for breaks.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Me: Displays study metrics including daily sessions completed and current streak, polling for updates every 5 seconds from the studyMetrics library.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Mu: Provides a toggle switch for enabling/disabling lo-fi background music during study sessions, persisting state to localStorage and controlling audio playback.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Po: Main Pomodoro timer component orchestrating timer display, controls, audio playback, session completion handling, motivational quotes, and metrics tracking. Supports streamer mode and transparent background options.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Pr: Renders an SVG circular progress ring with customizable size, stroke width, and color, including a glowing effect for the active progress arc.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/So: Provides a toggle switch for enabling/disabling the ticking sound during timer operation, with a note about automatic bell sound on session completion.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/us: Custom hook managing Pomodoro timer state including countdown logic, session switching, duration settings, color preferences, and timer controls (start/pause/reset/skip) with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Main navigation bar component with links to all major sections (Home, NCERT, Test Series, Daily Target, Community, Study Room) and login button. Hides in streamer mode on timer route.
frontend/src/components/SocialLinks.tsx: Renders social media links (Instagram and X/Twitter) with configurable icon sizes and spacing for header or footer variants.
frontend/src/components/studyRoom/StudyR: A confirmation dialog that opens a Google Meet link for the Focus Babu Study Room when the user confirms joining the group study session.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/ExamS: Manages an active exam session with question navigation, answer selection, countdown timer, and submit/exit dialogs for test-taking functionality.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/previ: Manages the exam session UI for previous year papers with countdown timer, section navigation, question palette, answer selection, and mark-for-review functionality; handles auto-submit on timeout and manual submission.

Displays results for previous year paper tests with summary statistics and detailed section-wise question review showing user answers, correct answers, and marked-for-review status; includes save status alerts.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/Previ: Displays categorized previous year papers for JEE Main, NEET, and CUET exams in a grid layout with start buttons for each paper.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/TestH: Displays authenticated user's test history in a table with scores, accuracy, and timestamps; shows sign-in prompt for unauthenticated users and handles loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/TestR: Renders test completion results with summary cards (score, accuracy, correct/incorrect counts) and detailed question-by-question review; displays save status alerts for authenticated and unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggleButto: Fixed-position button that toggles between light and dark themes, displaying a moon or sun icon based on current theme.
frontend/src/components/user/AuthProfile: Non-visual component that automatically fetches user profile after login and creates a default profile with auto-generated displayName if none exists.
Renders a user avatar component with optional photo URL or fallback initials, supporting three size variants (sm, md, lg).
frontend/src/components/WelcomeMotivatio: Full-screen overlay that displays a random welcome message for ~1 second with fade-in/fade-out animations on initial page load.
frontend/src/hooks/community/useChat.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching chat messages (with 3-second polling) and sending new messages with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/community/useComments: Provides React Query hooks for fetching comments by post ID and adding new comments with automatic cache invalidation for both comments and posts.
frontend/src/hooks/community/useModerati: Provides React Query hooks for admin moderation actions including checking admin status, deleting posts/comments/chat messages, and blocking users with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/community/usePosts.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all posts, creating new posts with image and caption, and liking posts with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/community/useUserProf: Provides hooks to fetch user profiles by principal string and resolve display names using React Query and the actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/dailyTarget/useDailyT: Manages daily task CRUD operations using localStorage for persistence, providing hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting tasks per user principal.
frontend/src/hooks/testSeries/useCountdo: Implements a countdown timer hook with start, stop, and reset functionality using React state and intervals.
frontend/src/hooks/testSeries/useTestHis: Provides hooks to fetch test history and save test results to the backend using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudio.ts: Manages HTML5 audio playback with play/pause controls and loop support using refs and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Provides authentication state including authenticated status, principal string, and login status derived from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardBackgroun: Manages dashboard background images with hooks to get, save, and clear backgrounds using ExternalBlob and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and provider with login, logout, and identity management using AuthClient.
Custom hook that syncs React state with localStorage, providing persistent state across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and saving user profiles (both caller and by principal) using React Query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and toggle functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, and animated gradient background effects.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Centralizes branding constants like site name, tagline, and provides utility functions for copyright text and app identifier.
frontend/src/lib/color.ts: Provides color utility functions including hex-to-rgba conversion, glow effect generation for drop-shadows, text shadow generation, and hex color validation.
frontend/src/lib/ncertData.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and data structures for NCERT chapters, subjects, and classes (Class 11 and 12), including official PDF URLs for Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and Mathematics textbooks.
frontend/src/lib/ncertLinks.ts: Validates NCERT PDF URLs to ensure they come from official ncert.nic.in domains, and provides encoding/decoding utilities for safe URL handling in navigation parameters.
frontend/src/lib/previousYearPapers/cata: Exports a catalog array of previous year paper entries for JEE Main, NEET, and CUET exams from 2021-2024, including metadata like exam type, year, shift, and unique IDs.
frontend/src/lib/previousYearPapers/inde: Central registry and export point for previous year papers, providing functions to retrieve papers by ID or filter by exam type, and importing all paper metadata modules.
frontend/src/lib/previousYearPapers/pape: Defines CUET 2024 and 2023 paper metadata with three sections (Languages, Domain Subjects, General Test), each containing 10 sample multiple-choice questions.
Contains JEE Main 2021 paper metadata with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics sections, each having 10 multiple-choice questions with prompts, options, and correct answers.
Contains JEE Main 2022 paper metadata structured with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics sections, each with 10 multiple-choice questions covering fundamental concepts.
Defines JEE Main 2023 (All Shifts) paper metadata with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics sections, including questions with optional solution explanations.
Exports JEE Main 2024 paper metadata with 10 Physics and partial Chemistry questions, including prompts, options, correct answers, and solutions.
Exports NEET 2021 paper metadata with 10 placeholder questions each for Physics, Chemistry, Botany, and Zoology sections.
Exports NEET 2022 paper metadata with 10 placeholder questions each for Physics, Chemistry, Botany, and Zoology sections.
Exports NEET 2023 paper metadata with 10 placeholder questions each for Physics, Chemistry, Botany, and Zoology sections.
Exports NEET 2024 paper metadata with 10 real questions each for Physics and Chemistry sections, plus partial Botany/Zoology.
frontend/src/lib/previousYearPapers/type: Defines TypeScript types for previous year paper questions, sections, metadata, and catalog entries for JEE/NEET/CUET exams.
frontend/src/lib/quotes.ts: Provides a collection of motivational quotes and a function to randomly select one.
frontend/src/lib/studyMetrics.ts: Manages daily study session tracking and streak calculation using localStorage with date-based logic.
frontend/src/lib/testSeriesData.ts: Defines test configuration types and provides sample questions for JEE, NEET, and CUET exams with validation and duration helpers.
frontend/src/lib/userIdentity.ts: Provides utilities to resolve display names from user profiles with fallbacks and derive initials for avatars.
frontend/src/lib/welcomeMotivationMessag: Exports a list of welcome motivation messages and a function to randomly select one.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Community page displaying posts, chat panel, and post composer. Shows login prompt for unauthenticated users and sorts posts by timestamp.
frontend/src/pages/DailyTargetPage.tsx: Daily task management page with add, edit, delete, toggle, and reset functionality. Displays progress stats and requires authentication for task operations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page featuring the Pomodoro timer, social links, and optional custom background for authenticated users. Includes site branding and footer.
frontend/src/pages/NcertPage.tsx: NCERT books directory page displaying chapter-wise books for Class 11 & 12 across Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and Mathematics.
frontend/src/pages/NcertPdfViewerPage.ts: Legacy redirect page that validates NCERT URLs and redirects to the new unified PDF viewer route.
frontend/src/pages/PdfViewerPage.tsx: PDF viewer page with zoom, page navigation, download controls, and error handling for NCERT PDFs. Validates URLs and displays PDFs in an iframe.
frontend/src/pages/TestSeriesPage.tsx: Test series page managing mock tests and previous year papers with exam sessions, results display, test history, and result saving for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/TimerPage.tsx: Standalone timer page with Pomodoro timer component supporting streamer mode and transparent background options stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear sensitive parameters from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palette using OKLCH color space (including sidebar, chart, and theme colors), typography, container queries, animations (accordion), and custom font families (Inter, Space Grotesk).
project_state.json: Project state document (v39) describing "Focus Babu" study website with Pomodoro timer, streamer mode, dark/light themes, Firebase-backed community features, NCERT PDFs, test series with exam interface, and daily target tracking; includes architectural notes and known deployment/navigation issues.
